props.name: isOpen
props.description: Controls whether the side panel is open.

props.name: headerTitle
props.description: The title displayed in the side panel's header.

props.name: size
props.description: Specifies the size of the side panel.

props.name: height
props.description: Sets the height of the side panel.

props.name: hideHeader
props.description: Controls the visibility of the side panel header.

props.name: position
props.description: Specifies the position of the side panel.

props.name: hasBackdrop
props.description: Determines whether a backdrop is displayed behind the side panel.

props.name: closeOutside
props.description: Controls whether clicking outside the side panel should close it.

props.name: escapeClose
props.description: Controls whether clicking ESC button should close it.

props.name: showAction
props.description: To show action label in snack. Default is false

props.name: actionText
props.description: Text label for the action function.

props.name: action
props.description: On click function of the action text.

props.name: showIcon
props.description: To show icon in snack. Default is false.

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration to show snack. Default is 4000 ms (4s) declared on store

props.name: type
props.description: Display type of stepper if displayed as compact (no solid bg color) or solid
